community.name: Gardens on Quail
community.overview: Gardens on Quail is a safe, secure assisted living and memory care community in Arvada, Colorado. Our campus offers compassionate care, engaging amenities and homelike comforts with 24/7 assistance and a vibrant social calendar.
community.description:
**Our Community**

Gardens on Quail features 56 assisted living apartments and a dedicated memory care neighborhood with 27 private suites.  Our philosophy centers on empowering residents and focusing on abilities rather than limitations.  A secure courtyard with heated walkways, train set and water feature invites outdoor enjoyment year‑round.  Spacious common areas include lounges with fireplaces, a fully stocked library, workout facilities, high‑end salon, chapel and community dining rooms with à‑la‑carte menus and daily specials.  Raised garden beds, a greenhouse, putting green and basketball court encourage fresh air and exercise.

**Dining**

Our chef‑driven program uses fresh seasonal ingredients—including vegetables and herbs from our on‑site gardens—to create delicious restaurant‑style meals.  Residents enjoy scratch‑made soups, weekly chef specials, vegetarian and diabetic options, wine nights and happy hours.  Private dining rooms, including a 1950s themed space, are available for special occasions and custom menus.

**Activities & Programs**

A full calendar of events keeps residents engaged: Happy Hour Fridays, Family Brunches, holiday celebrations, spa days and themed parties.  Weekly clubs include women's tea, men's club, Tasty Tuesdays, book and Bible studies, art therapy, outdoor gardening, pet interaction, Wii gaming, live music and memory‑care activities like balloon volleyball and hallway bowling.  Special outings take residents to the aquarium, museum, shopping, Rockies games, car shows, mountain trips and intergenerational programs with local schools.

**Memory Care Philosophy**

Our dementia‑capable care model integrates person‑centered approaches, Montessori methods, validation therapy and the Eden Alternative.  We emphasise meaningful activities, independence and social connection to support cognitive health.  Neighborhoods are named after Colorado towns and feature local artwork and Friday happy hours with entertainment.  Personalized care begins with a "My Story" assessment to understand each resident's history and preferences.
community.short_description: Compassionate assisted living and memory care in Arvada, CO with personalized support, secure courtyard and gourmet dining.
community.seo_title: Gardens on Quail | Assisted Living & Memory Care in Arvada, CO
community.seo_description: Gardens on Quail offers compassionate assisted living and memory care in Arvada, Colorado with luxurious amenities, engaging activities and personalized support.

care_types.name: Assisted Living
care_types.description: 56 private apartments with spacious common areas, tailored assistance and homelike comforts.

care_types.name: Memory Care
care_types.description: 27 private suites in secure neighborhoods focused on abilities, offering individualized dementia‑capable care.

amenities.name: Secure Courtyard with Train Set
amenities.description: Beautifully landscaped courtyard featuring heated walkways, a train set and water feature for year‑round enjoyment.

amenities.name: Garden Beds & Greenhouse
amenities.description: Raised garden beds and a greenhouse for residents to grow flowers, vegetables and herbs.

amenities.name: Putting Green & Basketball Court
amenities.description: Outdoor recreation areas including a putting green and half‑court basketball.

amenities.name: Library
amenities.description: Fully stocked library with comfortable seating and computer access.

amenities.name: Workout & Fitness Facilities
amenities.description: Exercise room with equipment for strength, balance and cardio training.

amenities.name: High‑End Salon
amenities.description: On‑site salon offering hair care and spa services.

amenities.name: Chapel
amenities.description: Peaceful chapel for worship services and reflection.

amenities.name: Restaurant‑Style Dining
amenities.description: À‑la‑carte menus, daily specials, scratch‑made soups and chef specials using fresh, seasonal ingredients.

amenities.name: Private Dining Rooms
amenities.description: Two private dining rooms—including a 1950s themed room—for celebrations and special events.

amenities.name: Peace of Mind Technology
amenities.description: Discreet fall detection and event‑based alerts for enhanced safety.

floor_plans.name: Two‑Bedroom (Memory Care)
floor_plans.description: Spacious two‑bedroom memory‑care residence ideal for couples or roommates, featuring two baths and kitchenette.

floor_plans.name: Assisted Living Studio

floor_plans.name: Assisted Living One‑Bedroom

features.title: Person‑Centered Memory Care
features.body: Our dementia‑capable care integrates Montessori methods, validation therapy and the Eden Alternative to focus on each resident's abilities and personal history.

features.title: Engaging Activities & Social Events
features.body: Weekly clubs, happy hour Fridays, family brunches, holiday celebrations and outings keep residents connected and fulfilled.

features.title: Fresh Seasonal Dining
features.body: Our chefs prepare scratch‑made soups, daily specials, vegetarian and diabetic options using herbs and vegetables from our own gardens.

highlights.title: Secure Courtyard & Gardens
highlights.description: Heated walkways, train set, water feature and raised garden beds offer safe outdoor enjoyment.

highlights.title: Dementia‑Capable Care
highlights.description: Person‑centered programs supported by Montessori and Eden Alternative philosophies.

highlights.title: Engaging Lifestyle
highlights.description: A robust schedule of events, clubs and outings fosters social connection and well‑being.

faqs.question: What care levels are offered?
faqs.answer: Gardens on Quail offers assisted living and memory care with personalized support for each resident.

faqs.question: What is included in the monthly rate?
faqs.answer: Your monthly fee includes meals, housekeeping, utilities, Wi‑Fi, activities, transportation and 24/7 care staff.

faqs.question: Are pets allowed?
faqs.answer: Yes, small pets are welcome subject to community policy.

galleries.title: Beautiful Grounds & Courtyard
galleries.description: See our secure courtyard, heated walkways and scenic gardens.

events.title: Family Brunch
events.summary: Monthly brunch for residents and their families.
events.description: Enjoy a delicious brunch with loved ones in our main dining room.  The menu features chef specialties, live music and a chance to connect with staff and other families.
events.location_text: Gardens on Quail Main Dining Room

events.title: Holiday Celebration
events.summary: Festive holiday event with music, decorations and special menu.
events.description: Celebrate the season with residents and families at our annual holiday celebration.  Enjoy live entertainment, holiday décor and a gourmet dinner prepared by our culinary team.
events.location_text: Gardens on Quail Courtyard & Dining Room

events.title: Summer Luau
events.summary: Annual luau with Hawaiian food, music and dancing.
events.description: Our Summer Luau brings the islands to Arvada with tropical décor, live hula dancers, a roasting pig and games.  Residents, families and staff come together for a fun‑filled evening.
